personal.name: Uvais Khan
personal.title: B.Tech Cybersecurity Student | Intern at NHPC Limited | Frontend & Backend Developer
personal.description: As a B.Tech Cybersecurity student at the Faculty of Technology, Veer Madho Singh Bhandari Uttarakhand Technical University, I'm passionate about cybersecurity, ethical hacking, and full-stack web development. I enjoy learning about secure coding, Linux systems, and OSINT. My goal is to build secure, efficient, and impactful digital solutions.
personal.aboutDescription: Hello! I'm Uvais Khan, a dedicated B.Tech Cybersecurity student at the Faculty of Technology, Veer Madho Singh Bhandari Uttarakhand Technical University. My journey in tech began with a passion for understanding how systems work, which led me to specialize in cybersecurity, ethical hacking, and full-stack web development. I love exploring Linux environments, diving into OSINT techniques, and building secure applications that make a real difference. Beyond academics, I've gained practical experience through internships at NHPC Limited, where I developed enterprise-level software using ASP.NET Core MVC and Oracle Database. I'm also certified as a Full Stack Developer from CodeYogi, and I actively participate in hackathons and tech communities. My hobbies include exploring Linux distributions, building web apps, participating in hackathons, public speaking, and watching tech documentaries. My ultimate goal is to create secure, efficient, and impactful digital solutions that contribute to a safer and more innovative world.

education.title: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Cybersecurity
education.institution: Faculty of Technology, Veer Madho Singh Bhandari Uttarakhand Technical University (UTU)
education.description: Specializing in cybersecurity, network defense, cryptography, and ethical hacking. Participated in hackathons, technical workshops, and industry events focused on AI, Blockchain, and Security.

education.title: Diploma in Engineering
education.description: Completed diploma with foundational knowledge in engineering principles and project management. Served as the student commander of the college's NSS unit.

education.title: Full Stack Developer Certification
education.description: Learned frontend web development using HTML, CSS,tailwindCSS, JavaScript, TypeScript and react.js.

education.title: Post Graduate Diploma in Financial Accounting (PGDFA)
education.description: Studied Financial Accounting, GST, and Tally ERP software.

education.title: 12th (Non-Medical)
education.description: Completed senior secondary education in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics.

education.title: 10th (High School)
education.description: Completed secondary education with a focus on Mathematics and Science.

projects.title: Village360
projects.description: A full-stack rural development analytics platform deployed on Vercel. It collects and visualizes data about village demographics, resources, and progress indicators. Built with a modern TypeScript frontend and Python backend, it offers dashboards for government agencies and NGOs to monitor village development in real-time.

projects.title: CivicSense
projects.description: A smart civic issue reporting and management platform built with React + Vite. It allows citizens to log complaints about civic infrastructure such as waste collection, streetlights, and road maintenance. The system includes categorized issue tracking, real-time status updates, and an admin dashboard for efficient resolution.

projects.title: Internal Complaint Management System
projects.description: A real-world project developed during internship at NHPC. Built using ASP.NET Core MVC with Oracle Express Database, featuring secure login, complaint tracking, and notification management.

projects.title: CarbonZero
projects.description: A solar power plant monitoring and management system built with ASP.NET Core MVC. It enables tracking of solar output, equipment performance, and maintenance schedules with real-time visualizations. Features include admin and technician dashboards, data logs, and system analytics to help optimize power efficiency.

projects.title: SecurityRiskScanner
projects.description: A web-based security scanner that detects vulnerabilities such as SQL injection and XSS. Generates detailed reports and stores results in PostgreSQL. Built with strong emphasis on code security and accessibility.

projects.title: FitLife
projects.description: A health tracking app built with React.js for monitoring sleep, workouts, and water intake. Features responsive UI and animated data visualizations using Chart.js.

projects.title: RiverGuard
projects.description: A comprehensive dashboard system for monitoring and safeguarding river health. Includes user authentication, admin management, and real-time data visualization using Flask and PostgreSQL.

basicProjects.title: Shows Finder
basicProjects.description: A web app for searching and displaying TV shows with responsive design and clean UI.

basicProjects.title: Todo App (TypeScript)
basicProjects.description: A simple to-do list app built using React and TypeScript with Redux for state management.

basicProjects.title: App.CodeYogi.io Clone
basicProjects.description: A clone of the CodeYogi student platform with responsive design and dynamic routing.

basicProjects.title: Ask-Jud Clone
basicProjects.description: A clone project replicating the Ask-Jud platform's front-end interface.

basicProjects.title: Todo App (Basic)
basicProjects.description: A beginner-level to-do app demonstrating useState and component structuring in React.

basicProjects.title: Tic-Tac-Toe Game
basicProjects.description: A fun interactive game built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to practice logic and DOM updates.

basicProjects.title: Tables Calculator
basicProjects.description: A basic arithmetic calculator capable of generating multiplication tables with dynamic UI.

basicProjects.title: Responsive Design Layouts
basicProjects.description: A collection of responsive page layouts demonstrating adaptive web design using TailwindCSS.

basicProjects.title: Team Card UI
basicProjects.description: A team profile card layout demonstrating responsive design and TailwindCSS utility classes.

basicProjects.title: Simple HTML Sheet
basicProjects.description: A minimal HTML and CSS page built to practice typography and layout design.

blogs.title: My NHPC Internship Experience: Building Real-World Software with ASP.NET Core MVC
blogs.description: During my internship at NHPC Limited, I gained real-world exposure to enterprise-level software development. My primary responsibility was developing an Internal Complaint Management System using ASP.NET Core MVC and Oracle Database.
blogs.content: During my internship at NHPC Limited, I gained real-world exposure to enterprise-level software development. My primary responsibility was developing an Internal Complaint Management System using ASP.NET Core MVC and Oracle Database. The project aimed to digitalize maintenance and employee issue tracking across departments. Working with experienced developers taught me the importance of secure coding, modular architecture, and proper database integration. I also learned about deployment pipelines and UI optimization for internal tools. This experience strengthened my understanding of backend systems, database management, and the practical aspects of cybersecurity implementation.

2.title: My NHPC Internship Experience: Building Real-World Software with ASP.NET Core MVC
2.content: During my internship at NHPC Limited, I gained real-world exposure to enterprise-level software development. My primary responsibility was developing an Internal Complaint Management System using ASP.NET Core MVC and Oracle Database. The project aimed to digitalize maintenance and employee issue tracking across departments. Working with experienced developers taught me the importance of secure coding, modular architecture, and proper database integration. I also learned about deployment pipelines and UI optimization for internal tools. This experience strengthened my understanding of backend systems, database management, and the practical aspects of cybersecurity implementation.
